1565920.name: Teamfight Manager - Donationware Tier 1
1565920.description:
Teamfight Manager - DLC for Developer Support

This DLC does not provide any additional in-game features.

All additional updates will be provided free of charge to Teamfight Manager game holders.

Teamfight Manager's DLC packages are sold solely to financially support Team Samoyed's game development.

The DLC for all future games developed by Team Samoyed, as well as Teamfight Manager, will be sold for sponsorship purposes only, and updates will be equally free.

Thank you for supporting our team. We will always do our best to make a good game without losing our original mindset.
1565920.supported_languages:
韩语*, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
